name: proxet-tournament.2021.js
description: You are the part of team who are doing online game about fighting vehicle team battles.  Your today's task - to implement algorithm about team compilation for the battle session.  You need to select 9 players for each team with longest waiting time in lobby and each team should contain 3 vehicles of each of 3 possible types. ## Technical task ### Team generator We've already prepared all battle abstractions, and we're using ``TeamGenerator`` class to retrieve teams for battle. So, make sure you use it to implement your algorithm.
author: Proxet
